title: LFT Silver or Gold Serious/ Non serious team. 2 PPL
body:
Looking for a team that is layed back and able to perform well with limited seriousness and heavily active. I only really play adc can play other roles if needed. Also my mate will join with me hes able to play all. We are high silver/ low gold players. We are both 20. 
Ign : H4x
